trans-unit.source: Represents a column header for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示的列标题<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A GridViewColumnHeader object is a button control that is derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.
trans-unit.target: GridViewColumnHeader 对象是从<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>派生一个按钮控件

trans-unit.source: GridViewColumnHeader properties keep track of mouse events and the resizing of columns.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪鼠标事件和列的大小调整的 GridViewColumnHeader 属性。

trans-unit.source: Column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode are GridViewColumnHeader objects.
trans-unit.target: 中的列标题<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>视图模式是 GridViewColumnHeader 对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can customize GridViewColumnHeader objects by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此类中和相关类中找到的属性的各种自定义 GridViewColumnHeader 对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关这些属性，以及它们之间的优先级的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A GridViewColumnHeader is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: GridViewColumnHeader 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，这意味着，它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 一个映像或一个面板） 的单个对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>关联<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识符<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column%2A>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Responds when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 响应时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>为<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>按下。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 事件自变量。

trans-unit.source: Responds to the creation of the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 响应的可视化树的创建<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> and updates the floating version of the header when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>并更新标头的浮点版本时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event when a column is changing its position.
trans-unit.target: 此实现不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件时列的位置发生变化。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: Provides an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>实现<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> implementation of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostKeyboardFocus%2A> clears mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>实现<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostKeyboardFocus%2A>清除鼠标捕获。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostKeyboardFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 此实现不会更改<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"></xref> event when the user pauses the mouse pointer on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"></xref>事件时用户将鼠标指针停在<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event when the user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> and its column to a new location in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> by using the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 此实现处理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>事件，当用户拖动<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>及其列中的新位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>使用鼠标。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: To handle the event, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 对事件进行处理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs>设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref> event when the mouse moves off the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref>事件当鼠标移出时<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event when the user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> with the mouse from its old location, to move the header and its column.
trans-unit.target: 此实现处理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>事件，当用户拖动<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>使用鼠标从其原位置，若要移动的标头并且其列。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: To handle the event, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 对事件进行处理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs>设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> event when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref>事件在用户将鼠标指针暂停在上时按鼠标左键时<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event so that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> can support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: 此实现处理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>事件以便<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>能够支持移动列的拖放操作。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: This method captures the mouse and sets the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可捕获鼠标和集<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>事件自变量`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> event when the user releases the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref>事件，当用户将鼠标指针暂停在上时松开鼠标左键<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event (which occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: 此实现处理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>事件 (时会出现此情况时<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs>设置为`true`)。</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: It also ends the mouse capture that was set by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它还将结束设置鼠标捕获<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: This provides a way for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: 这提供了一种方法<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>以支持移动列的拖放操作。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>事件自变量`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> event that occurs when the user moves the mouse within a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref>用户内移动鼠标时发生的事件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation keeps the left mouse button in a pressed state while a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> is moved by a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 此实现中按下状态时保持鼠标左键<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>移动了拖放操作。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: This also causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> to remain set to `true` when the mouse with its left mouse button pressed moves off the header.
trans-unit.target: 这也会导致<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>保持设置为`true`其鼠标左键的鼠标按下时移开标头。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation keeps the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event so that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method can support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: 此实现保留<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>事件自变量设置为`false`为<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>事件以便<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法能够支持移动列的拖放操作。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref> dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 响应中的更改<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>维度。

trans-unit.source: Information about the change in the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 有关中的大小的更改的信息<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the role of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取角色<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> class performs layout for the column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> and places an additional column header at the end to add space.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter>类列中的标头执行布局<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>，并将另一个列标题放在要添加空间的 end。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter>

trans-unit.source: A Role value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole> identifies this column header in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>中的此列标题</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>的角色值

trans-unit.source: A Role value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole> identifies a column that is currently the object of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个角色值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>标识目前拖放操作的对象的一列。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the current role of the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole"> </xref>枚举值，指定列的当前角色。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识符<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to serialize a <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否序列化<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method applies to the following dependency properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelectorProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.StyleProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipProperty>
trans-unit.target: 此方法适用于以下的依赖项属性:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelectorProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.StyleProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipProperty></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipProperty> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.StyleProperty> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelectorProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateProperty>

trans-unit.source: The dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性中。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref> must be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>必须序列化; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
